question: Rhesus macaque, dhole, Bengal porcupine, king cobra, flying squirrel, himalyan brown bear are listed in which of the following schedules of Wildlife Protection Act?
explanation: Rhesus macaque, dhole, Bengal porcupine, king cobra, flying squirrel, himalyan brown bear are listed inÂ  Part II of Schedule 2 of Wildlife Protection Act. Offences under this schedule is prescribed the highest penalties.
